main

Class Launcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Launcher

  • public final class Launcher
extends java.lang.Object
    FULLY DOCUMENTED. The class containing the main method to execute the program.
    Author:
    Joe Benassi

    • Field Summary

      This value equals the instance of JCAT.

      This is the MainPageFiller that occupies the current primary Shell.

      private static java.lang.String successMessage

      Launcher() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addEvent(int time, java.lang.String config, java.lang.String msgStr)
      Adds an event to the Event Window.
      private static void addShellExitBehavior(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell shell)
      Adds a "Confirm Quit" prompt when the user attempts to exit.
      static void addUserActivity(java.lang.String userActivityMessage)
      Adds a mesage to the User Activity window.
      static int getInstanceNum()
      Returns the instanceNum; the number denoting the particular instance of JCAT.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      The main method to execute the program.
      static void restartApplication(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell s)
      Sets the current main page invisible, and calls startup().
      static void shutdown()
      If shouldRestart is false, then this disposes of all resources, popups, shells, and the Display.
      static void startup()
      Increments the InstanceNum, disposes of old popups, resets the time, resets Networker, adds the main page, adds the 'Continue?' prompt on exit, adds the menu, launches the 'new user' window if appropriate, displays the main page, and displays in the Event Window if JCAT's startup was successful.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • shouldRestart

        private static boolean shouldRestart

      • version

        private static final java.lang.String version
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • successMessage

        private static final java.lang.String successMessage
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • failureMessage

        private static final java.lang.String[] failureMessage

      • mainPageFiller

        public static volatile MainPageFiller mainPageFiller
        This is the MainPageFiller that occupies the current primary Shell. When File > Restart is executed, this does not get destroyed.

      • instanceNum

        private static volatile int instanceNum
        This value equals the instance of JCAT. It increments every time JCAT restarts. This is so that certain threads end after a restart. This is safe because those same threads are created on JCAT's restart.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Launcher

        public Launcher()

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static final void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main method to execute the program. Starts PktReader, and calls 'startup()'.
        Parameters:
        args - the main method argument

      • startup

        public static final void startup()
        Increments the InstanceNum, disposes of old popups, resets the time, resets Networker, adds the main page, adds the 'Continue?' prompt on exit, adds the menu, launches the 'new user' window if appropriate, displays the main page, and displays in the Event Window if JCAT's startup was successful.

      • shutdown

        public static final void shutdown()
        If shouldRestart is false, then this disposes of all resources, popups, shells, and the Display.

      • addShellExitBehavior

        private static final void addShellExitBehavior(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell shell)
        Adds a "Confirm Quit" prompt when the user attempts to exit.
        Parameters:
        shell - The shell to add the listener to.

      • restartApplication

        public static final void restartApplication(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell s)
        Sets the current main page invisible, and calls startup().
        Parameters:
        s - The current primary shell; the Shell the main page is currently occupying.

      • addEvent

        public static final void addEvent(int time,
            java.lang.String config,
            java.lang.String msgStr)
        Adds an event to the Event Window.
        Parameters:
        time - The time for this event. First column.
        config - The config for this event. Second column.
        msgStr - The event message. Third column.

      • addUserActivity

        public static final void addUserActivity(java.lang.String userActivityMessage)
        Adds a mesage to the User Activity window.
        Parameters:
        userActivityMessage - The message to display.

      • getInstanceNum

        public static final int getInstanceNum()
        Returns the instanceNum; the number denoting the particular instance of JCAT. This instanceNum changes whenever JCAT is restarted.
        Returns:
        The instance of JCAT.
